entry.notes: Imported from Times Microwave Systems catalog

source_text:
Times Microwave Systems LMR-240
Model: LMR-240
Type: cable
0.240" diameter flexible coaxial cable, PE jacket
Impedance: 50 ohms
Velocity: 84.0%
Attenuation at 50 MHz: 0.8 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 150 MHz: 1.4 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 220 MHz: 1.8 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 450 MHz: 2.6 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 900 MHz: 3.9 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 1800 MHz: 5.9 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 1900 MHz: 6.1 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 2400 MHz: 6.9 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 5800 MHz: 12.0 dB/100ft

expected_json.description: 0.240" diameter flexible coaxial cable, PE jacket
expected_json.notes: Good compromise between flexibility and loss for short runs
